Name: N0va Desktop
About the game: Simply click the desktop to wake Lumi up Enjoy an immersive experience with a lovely companion that's always by your side! Product Features · Click on Lumi to wake her up and see her sparkling eyes · Select from a variety of themes to suit any mood · Switch between the latest featured gaming wallpapers with a single click Download exclusive live wallpapers now and enjoy Lumi's company every day!
